Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Groww PNL Summary section to P&L statement

Added a dedicated section that collects and displays all Groww Trades PNL entries from across all fiscal years in one consolidated view.

Features:
- Displays fiscal year, TPL, and NTPL for each Groww entry
- Shows total NTPL across all years in the header
- Green gradient styling to distinguish from other sections
- Collapsible table view matching the design of other sections
- Positioned after the "All Matched Positions" section
